prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Agency for International Development Contract with the Federal University of Cearaá, Brazil papers(AZ 441). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The objectives of the grant project were to ascertain the needs of the agricultural colleges at Fortaleza, Ceará, and Recife, Pernambuco with regard to administration, faculties, facilities, finances, and research programs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, reports, workbook and historical materials.

item.corpname: United States. Agency for International Development

scopecontent.p: Castro, Francisco Alves de Andrade e: ENSINO E DESENVOLVIMENTO DAS CIENCIAS AGRARIAS NO NORDESTE (CEARA); 1918-1978. Fortaleza, BNB, 1979.
